column4: in /etc/apt/sources.list change each warty to a hoary.  However be warned that it is not recommend to run hoary at this time unless you are prepared to have problems.
I was thinking to install it as a seperate system
so basically I should install warty and then change sources.list to get stuff from hoary
OK by me.... yeah do a upgrade after you change the sources list.  New packages are being added fairly often
